hymn.title: Wrecked outright on Jesus' breast
hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—The Way of Rest

layout.singingstanza: "Wrecked out -- right on Je -- sus' breast": On -- ly "wrecked" souls thus can sing; Lit -- tle boats that hug the shore, Fear -- ing what the storm may bring, Nev -- er find on Je -- sus' breast, All that "wrecked" souls mean by rest.

lyrics.stanza: "Wrecked outright on Jesus' breast": Only "wrecked" souls thus can sing; Little boats that hug the shore, Fearing what the storm may bring, Never find on Jesus' breast, All that "wrecked" souls mean by rest.
"Wrecked outright!" 'Twas purest gain, Henceforth other craft can see That the storm may be a boon, That, however rough the sea, God Himself doth watchful stand, For the "wreck" is in His hand.
